data.lyric:
[ti:Life Changes]
[ar:Thomas Rhett]
[al:Life Changes]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Life Changes - Thomas Rhett
[00:05.69]Written by : Thomas Rhett/Rhett Akins/Jesse Frasure/Ashley Gorley
[00:11.39]Waking up in my college dorm
[00:13.58]
[00:14.08]Yeah my life it was pretty normal
[00:16.58]Looking for a date to the spring formal
[00:19.16]Wasn't worried 'bout nothing else
[00:22.17]Majoring in undecided
[00:24.64]Notebook full of bad songs I was writing
[00:27.05]Never dreamed anybody else would like them
[00:29.91]Now they're sitting on a Walmart shelf
[00:32.13]Ain't it funny how life changes
[00:36.12]You wake up ain't nothing the same and life changes
[00:41.24]You can't stop it just hop on the train
[00:44.19]You never know what's gonna happen
[00:46.67]You make your plans and you hear god laughing
[00:49.37]Life changes and I wouldn't change it for the world the world oh no
[00:58.59]And I wouldn't change it for the world the world oh no
[01:03.17]
[01:05.83]I bought a ring and she said i do
[01:07.87]But everybody else said man you're twenty two
[01:10.92]Whatcha trying to prove
[01:12.26]Hey why don't you wait
[01:13.57]'Cause I've been waiting on her since the second grade yeah
[01:16.58]And now she got her own set of fans
[01:19.05]She got a blue check mark by her Instagram
[01:21.50]And I wrote a little song about holding her hand
[01:24.26]And now everybody wanna die happy now
[01:26.79]Ain't it funny how life changes
[01:30.49]You wake up ain't nothing the same and life changes
[01:35.84]You can't stop it just hop on the train
[01:38.24]You never know what's gonna happen
[01:41.18]You make your plans and you got laughing
[01:43.95]Life changes and I wouldn't change it for the world the world oh no
[01:52.43]
[01:53.08]And I wouldn't change it for the world the world oh no
[01:57.69]
[02:00.08]I remember the day I told my daddy
[02:02.05]And mama you're gonna have a grandkid yep
[02:04.57]
[02:05.08]From Uganda that's right we're adopting
[02:07.43]And she is the cutest little girl that you've ever seen
[02:10.70]Well I was wrapping my head around being a dad
[02:13.16]A bigger ranch got thrown in the plans we thought we'd had
[02:16.72]Now Lauren's showing got one on the way
[02:18.87]Yeah that's two under two hey what can I say
[02:21.11]Ain't it funny how life changes
[02:25.18]You wake up ain't nothing the same and life changes
[02:30.42]You can't stop it just hop on the train
[02:32.91]You never know what's gonna happen
[02:35.78]You make your plans and you got laughing
[02:38.16]Life changes and I wouldn't change it for the world the world oh no
[02:47.35]And I wouldn't change it for the world the world oh no
data.trans:
[ti:Life Changes]
[ar:Thomas Rhett]
[al:Life Changes]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:05.76]//
[00:11.53]在大学宿舍醒来
[00:13.72]
[00:14.23]我的生活就这么平淡无奇
[00:16.72]想找个舞伴 一起去春季社交舞会
[00:19.31]对其他事我都不管不问
[00:22.31]主修课还没选好
[00:24.79]本子里就已写满糟糕的歌
[00:27.19]我从未想过会有其他人喜欢这些歌
[00:30.05]现在它们正在沃尔玛的货架上热卖
[00:32.27]生活的变迁难道不有趣吗
[00:36.26]你醒来后 一切都不似从前 生活已经发生改变
[00:41.39]你无法阻止世事变迁 那就搭乘生活列车远去吧
[00:44.34]你永远无法预知未来
[00:46.81]你做好计划 却听到苍天的讥笑
[00:49.52]生活时刻都在改变 我不会为这个世界改变自己的生活 不
[00:58.73]我不会为这个世界改变自己的生活 不
[01:03.31]
[01:05.98]我买了钻戒 她说愿意和我携手一生
[01:08.02]但别人都说 伙计 你才二十二岁
[01:11.07]你想证明什么
[01:12.40]为何不再等几年
[01:13.71]因为从二年级开始 我就一直为她耐心守候
[01:16.73]如今她有了自己的粉丝团
[01:19.20]她的Ins上也有了名人认证标志
[01:21.65]我写了一首和她幸福牵手的歌
[01:24.40]现在 每个人都想在幸福中晕厥
[01:26.93]生活的变迁难道不有趣吗
[01:30.64]你醒来后 一切都不似从前 生活已经发生改变
[01:35.98]你无法阻止世事变迁 那就搭乘生活列车远去吧
[01:38.38]你永远无法预知未来
[01:41.33]你做好计划 却被讥笑
[01:44.09]生活时刻都在改变 我不会为这个世界改变自己的生活 不
[01:52.58]
[01:53.22]我不会为这个世界改变自己 不
[01:57.83]
[02:00.23]我还记得那天 我告诉父亲
[02:02.19]和母亲 你们就要有孙女了
[02:04.71]
[02:05.23]她来自乌干达 没错 我们收养了一个女孩
[02:07.57]她会是你见过的最可爱的女孩
[02:10.85]好吧 成为父亲这件事让我时刻深感幸福
[02:13.30]我们计划经营一个更大的农场
[02:16.87]现在 劳拉又怀上一个宝宝
[02:19.01]膝下儿女成双 我夫复何求
[02:21.25]生活的变迁难道不有趣吗
[02:25.33]你醒来后 一切都不似从前 生活已经发生改变
[02:30.57]你无法阻止世事变迁 那就搭乘生活列车远去吧
[02:33.05]你永远无法预知未来
[02:35.92]你做好计划 却被讥笑
[02:38.30]生活时刻都在改变 我不会为这个世界改变自己的生活 不
[02:47.50]我不会为这个世界改变自己的生活 不
